mapper.select: SELECT f.fishing_id AS "baitingId", f.fishermen_id AS "fishermenId", f.fish_id AS "fishId", f.fishing_status AS "baitingStatus", m.user_name AS "fishName", m.user_age AS "fishAge", m.user_address AS "fishAddress", m.user_height AS "fishHeight", m.user_body AS "fishBody" FROM fishing f JOIN member m ON f.fish_id = m.user_id WHERE f.fishermen_id = #{fishermenId}

SELECT f.fishing_id AS "baitingId", f.fishermen_id AS "fishermenId", f.fishing_status AS "baitingStatus", m.user_name AS "fishermenName", m.user_age AS "fishermenAge" FROM fishing f JOIN member m ON f.fishermen_id = m.user_id WHERE f.fish_id = #{fishId}

SELECT f.fishing_id AS "baitingId", f.fishermen_id AS "fishermenId", f.fish_id AS "fishId", f.fishing_status AS "baitingStatus" FROM fishing f WHERE f.fish_id = #{fishId} AND f.fishing_status = 'S' AND ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT m.user_phone_number FROM fishing f JOIN member m ON f.fish_id = m.user_id WHERE f.fish_id = #{fishId} AND f.fishing_status = 'S' AND ROWNUM <= 1
